product_name: Mammut Lithia Z Pack - Women's - Overstock
long_description: Small and streamlined, the ultralight Mammut Lithia Z day pack is sized to hold your essentials, keeping you light on your feet for speedy trail running or hiking adventures. Breathable mesh shoulder straps and padded hipbelt provide direct body contact and good ventilation. Padded and mesh-covered back panel helps wick away perspiration and vent excess body heat. Hydration-compatible design features a reservoir sleeve with hanging tabs and a sip-tube exit port for on-the-go hydration (reservoir not included). Hipbelt pocket, front storage compartment and side stretch pockets help you organize your headlamp, batteries and water bottles. Mammut Lithia Z women's daypack features stowable trekking-pole holder, diagonal-carry ski attachment and straps with reflective accents. Overstock.
short_description: Small and streamlined, the ultralight Mammut Lithia Z day pack is sized to hold your essentials, keeping you light on your feet for speedy trail running or hiking adventures.
